What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Education&Reference > Homework Help > Resolved Question pal_2877... Member since: 26 December 2008 Total points: 111 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » What questions should i add in fast food questionnaire? plz help me as this is the last day for my project.............. suggest me some gud questions 4 years ago Report Abuse
Additional Details i need minimum 15 questions plz give me as soon as possible 4 years ago by skn8700 Member since: 25 April 2006 Total points: 5,922 (Level 5) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Here's is my contribution: In which Fast Foods is"Monosodium Glutamate"used as a taste enhancer ? (2) Suggest some healthy alternatives to Monosodium Glutamate to be used in Indian fast Foods? (3) Name some typical Indian Fast Foods that ONLY use Natural taste makers.(4) In spite of the dangerous health effects"Monosodium Glutamate"of why is the Chemical NOT banned in INDIA or Countries of the far East. 4 years ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS

Other Answers (3) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Amanda Member since: 19 November 2006 Total points: 5,224 (Level 5) Add Contact Block On average, how many times a month do you eat fast food?
What is your favorite kind of fast food chain: burgers, chicken, tacos
Do you"super"size when you have the chance?
I really don't know what kind of questions you are looking for, but hope I helped. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Rina Member since: 23 November 2008 Total points: 153 (Level 1) Add Contact Block How often do you eat fast food?
Do you eat fast food for the convenience or taste?
What is the first thing that comes to your mind when you think of fast food? (ex: grease, hamburger, quick, etc.)
Do you think you eat more or less when you eat fast food compared to a home cooked meal? 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Oscar1 Member since: 25 March 2007 Total points: 538 (Level 2) Add Contact Block When you eat fast food, what's the reason:convenience, price or taste?
What fast food chain is in your opinion the most healthy?
What fast food chain is in your opinion the least healthy? 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes
